content: That's really helpful! I was also thinking of asking everyone to bring their favorite book-themed dish, like a "Fahrenheit 451" fire-engine red velvet cake or a "Harry Potter" Hogwarts House cupcake. Do you think that's a good idea? By the way, I posted a recipe for a type of chocolate cake in the 'Foodie Frenzy' group, and it got a lot of likes and comments.
